original_title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Fatal Liaison - The Strange Affair of Adolf and Eva
overview: The protracted romance between Adolf Hitler and Eva Braun began in 1929 and ended in 1945 in the bunker under the ruins of the Chancellery. Eva was Hitlerâ€™s bride for less than 40 hours before she committed suicide.
title: Hitler's Last Secrets: Fatal Liaison - The Strange Affair of Adolf and Eva
